name: Jasleen Kaur 0001
content: Jasleen Kaur Home | Publications | CV | Contact Me | Jasleen Kaur Associate Professor and Director of Graduate Studies Department of Computer Science University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill My research interests lie in the design and analysis of networks and operating systems. My current and recent research has focussed on Characterizing Data Center Network Performance, the Packet-scale Congestion Control paradigm, Network Traffic Analysis, and Internet Measurements. For details, check out the links below. I serve as the Director of Graduate Studies in the Department of Computer Science at UNC-Chapel Hill. I am also the coordinator for the Triangle Computer Science Distinguished Lecture Series. Research Publications Recent Course Offerings: Internet Services and Protocols (COMP 431): Spring 2025. Wireless and Mobile Networks (COMP 635): Spring 2024. Networked and Distributed Systems (COMP 631): Spring 2023. Computer Architecture (COMP 740): Spring 2022. Data Structures (COMP 410): Spring 2014. Network Transport Protocols (COMP 790-088): Spring 2012. Introduction to Programming WWW (COMP 110): Fall 2011. Independent Research Projects (COMP 991): Fall 2010. Student Advisees: Junhua Yan, ABD. Qianwen Yin, Ph.D. 2018. Sean Sanders, Ph.D. 2017. Alok Shriram, Ph.D., 2009. Sushant Rewaskar, Ph.D., 2008. Hasan Faik Alan, M.S. 2020. Kevin Wang, M.S. 2016. Eric Gavaletz, M.S. 2014. Alfredo Miranda, M.S. 2013. Roberto Rodriguez, M.S. 2013. Rebecca Lovewell, M.S. 2012. Caitlyn Losee, M.S. 2012. Chiung-Yi Tseng, M.S. 2011. Simona Bacanu, M.S. 2010. Vishnu Konda, M.S. 2009. Ritesh Kumar, M.S. 2009. James Martin, B.S. 2015. Rebecca Lovewell, B.S. 2011. Eric Gavaletz, B.S. 2009. Statements: Research Statement. Teaching Statement. Service Statement. CV.
